alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Eastern Orleans; Lower Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 26 at 2:53PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western St. Bernard, central Orleans, east central Lafourche, central Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 400 PM CST... At 253 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Myrtle Grove, or 16 miles west of Port Sulphur, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Chalmette, East New Orleans, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Harvey, Port Sulphur, Jean Lafitte, Violet, Lafitte, Meraux, Poydras, Myrtle Grove, Pointe A La Hache, Shell Beach, Barataria, Terrytown and Arabi. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 248 and 255. Interstate 510 between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
